dialogs.patient: Hi Doctor, I am having Fever and Headache
dialogs.doctor: In that case, do you have any Runny nose?
In that case, do you have any Pharynx discomfort?

dialogs.patient: No, I don't have any Pharynx discomfort.
dialogs.doctor: In that case, do you have any Muscle Aches?

dialogs.patient: No, I don't have any muscle aches. But I have breast pain.
dialogs.doctor: In that case, you might have Mastitis.
